page.title: 06Farming in the Salem Area.
page.content: Salem is primarily an agricultural area. Farming is mainly mixed:-dairy, beef,sheep,and a small amount of bees, goats, horses and fowls.{ Welsh Black {cattle} are bred at Maes y castell and Tirmynydd;{Llanwenog sheep}at Crug Cwm { Bearded collies}at Llwyncelyn uchaf, &{Australian finches}at Crown Cottage. Several farms sell dairy produce, e.g. cream,yoghurt, butter and cheese.{ {Agricultural contracting}is widespread being an additional source of income to the farmers,e.g.grass conservation, field work, dipping, sheepshearing,and hedge cutting.{ Dog feed supplier}-The Mount. Hay and Straw supplier -Merlin ,{Gas and Electric Welding}-Pantybedw, {Veterinary Surgeon} -small branch at Hendre Wen -main surgery at Llandeilo. The larger farms are very modernised.
